ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
The MAD 20: A salute to the 20 dumbest people and things of 2008, with a special award for the Hall of Fame for multiple wins.
Signs You'll Grow Up To Be A Degenerate Gambler: Things you can notice about children that may foretell their desire to gamble.
Sergio Aragonès Presents A Mad Look at Hard Times: Problems you may experience when economic times are tough, and a few solutions to those problems.
Spy Vs. Spy: The Black Spy loses his secret plans due to a plot by the White Spy involving a pie.
It's A Good Brand Name...And A Bad Brand Name...: Shows how brand names are not transferable to other products.
ComicInfo.Tags: White Spy,Sharon Stone,Demon,Popeye,Wesley Snipes,Bitterman,Miley Cyrus,David Duchovny,Hillary Clinton,Billy Ray Cyrus,John McCain,Joe Biden,Bigfoot,Sarah Palin,Black Spy,OJ Simpson,Amy Winehouse,Jesse Jackson,Barbie,Alfred E. Neuman,George W. Bush
